Directions.1: Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Set aside.

Directions.2: Beat butter in a bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Add sugar and continue beating. Pour in egg, honey, and lemon juice; mix well. Add flour mixture and mix dough until blended.

Directions.3: Wrap dough in wax paper and chill in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight.

Directions.4: When ready to bake, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.5: Roll dough on a lightly floured work surface using a lightly floured rolling pin to desired thickness. Cut into shapes using cookie cutters of your choice. Place cookies 1 inch apart on the prepared baking sheets.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
